text: Today on the West Coast, we're seeing some fun 2 ft @ 8s NW swell with fresh 17 mph E winds. Balephetrish and Balevullin Bay are looking good, especially from 09:03 to 15:55. Tomorrow, conditions drop to a poor 2 ft @ 12s WNW with light 8 mph ENE winds, so itâ€™s best to give it a miss. The day after, Dunaverty offers a slight improvement at 2 ft @ 6s NE, but still not ideal. Best: today.
